title: prEmAnandamutO
sahitya:
prEmAnandamutO dhyAnamu jEyavE priyatamaina manasA parabrahma svarUpuni


anupallavi

  nAmarUpa guNa jAti bhEda rahita nAduni ati sanAtuni sAdhugA


caraNam    hrdaya kuharamulO aham aham ahamani nrtyamulADu Om satya sanAthanuDu 
sakala lOka sAmrAjyamahEshuDu sarvAntaryAmi saccidAnanda svAmini
